key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party foundries and suppliers in Asia
Intense market competition from major players like Texas Instruments and Analog Devices
Dependence on the cyclical consumer electronics sector
Regulatory risks including export controls and environmental compliance
environmental_issues: Need to comply with stringent environmental regulations in the semiconductor industry
social_issues: Ensuring ethical supply chain practices, including avoidance of child labor
governance_issues: Managing regulatory compliance and potential legal risks
